errorCode.illegalAction.applicationSentInOrDeleted: The application cannot be displayed or changed because it has been deleted or submitted to NAV
errorCode.illegalAction.fileCannotBeRead: File upload failed because the file cannot be read. Check that it is not encrypted or password protected and try again
errorCode.illegalAction.sendInErrorNoApplication: Submission failed because no application document has been uploaded
errorCode.illegalAction.sendInErrorNoChange: Submission failed because there are no changes to send to NAV
errorCode.illegalAction.notSupportedFileFormat: Wrong file format. It is only allowed to upload files of type PDF, JPEG/JPG and PNG
errorCode.illegalAction.fileSizeSumTooLarge: The sum of the size of uploaded files for the entire application exceeds the maximum allowed size. The maximum size allowed is 150MB in total.
errorCode.illegalAction.vedleggFileSizeSumTooLarge: The sum of the size of uploaded files for this attachment exceeds the maximum allowed size. The maximum size allowed is 50MB in total.
